resources.string: Welcome to ViaggiaTrento! This app lets you consult bus and train timetables, city parking slots availability, plan journeys, and even inform the community of train or bus delays.
Set up your usual routes to be notified about possible delays
Keep track of your usual travel routes here
Notify users about train or city bus delays
Check the local bus or train schedule or find available parking in the city
Read notifications about the journeys you saved
Check the Trento city buses\' timetable
Check the Rovereto city buses\' timetable
Check the availability of city parking slots
Check the availability of Rovereto parking slots
Learn about the municipality decrees about mobility
